dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2844 IH: To authorize 2 additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. DeGette (for herself, Mr. Perlmutter, Mr. Tipton, Mr. Buck, Mr. Lamborn, Mr. Coffman, and Mr. Polis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To authorize 2 additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado.

section.header: Additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado

subsection.text: The President shall appoint, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, 2 additional district judges for the district of Colorado.

In order that the table contained in section 133(a) of title 28, United States Code, will reflect the change in the number of judgeships authorized by subsection (a), the item relating to Colorado in such table is amended by striking 7 and inserting 9.
